eeka pudgalaya anuwa ee awasthawa anuwa wenas wenawa aniwaryayenma.ithamath karyabahula sathiyak gatha karana kenekge abhipraya honda sapa pahasu nindak labaganima wenna puluwan.thawa kenekuta thaman aashakarana pothak kiyawima,krida wadasatahanak,chithrapatayak narambaima,pawule kattiya ekka gamanaka yedima,gedara wadakatayuththaka yedima aadi wiwidha de wenna puluwan.samahara welawata samaharu sathi anthayedi karyabahula wenna puluwan anith dawaswalata wada.eeka thamayi jiwithe hati.mama me kiyanna hadanne api samaharak welawata hari dakshayi anith ayage me widihata salasum karala thiyena wadapiliwela nasthikarala danna.habayi api hithalama neweyi me de karanne.api anapekshithawa an ayage niweswalata yama thulin eeth ee de siddha wenawa.aththatama apita monawada me gana karanna puluwan.
